use_cases: ["Primer design for mtDNA amplification based on published An. gambiae sequence", "Comparative analysis of mtDNA structure and gene organization between An. darlingi and An. gambiae", "Calculation of nucleotide composition and base skews across anopheline species", "Phylogenetic reconstruction using An. gambiae mtDNA in maximum parsimony, maximum likelihood, and Bayesian analyses", "Testing for positive selection in protein-coding genes using An. gambiae in PAML analysis", "Estimation of divergence times between anopheline lineages using Bayesian molecular clock analysis", "Sequence alignment and annotation of An. darlingi mtDNA by comparison with An. gambiae", "Calculation of sequence identity percentages between An. darlingi and An. gambiae for individual genes"]
